item.title: Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl coming to PS5, PC on February 26 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Currently available for Switch.

Experience will release dungeon RPG Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on February 26 in Japan for 4,800 yen, the developer announced.

Monkarufanta: The Hero and the Crystal Girl first launched for Switch on September 18, 2025 in Japan.

The PlayStation 5 and PC versions have been adjusted to make the game more enjoyable based on feedback from the Switch release. An update containing these improvements will be available for the Switch version at a later date.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

A nostalgic top-down command RPG meets a loot-heavy hack-and-slash system.

A fresh RPG experience that combines two beloved genres in a way you’ve never seen before.

Key Features

  • A Classic Hero’s Journey Packed With Timeless RPG Adventure!
    • Set off on a grand quest to defeat the Demon Lord, just like the RPGs of old.
    • Trek across wide fields, sail the seas, and battle monsters in lands unknown.
    • Explore dungeons, solve clever gimmicks, and uncover rare treasures.
    • Enjoy the intuitive gameplay and charm unique to top-down RPGs.
  • Create Your Own Legendary Party With Unique Companions!
    • Adventure with a four-member party: the hero and three allies of your choosing.
    • Customize your team by selecting from eight distinct and colorful job classes.
    • As you level up, allocate stat and skill points freely to suit your strategy.
    • Train and strengthen your personalized hero party, and enjoy every battle to the fullest!
  • Irresistible Combat With the MONKARU Skill System!
    • Use powerful skills like “Double Drop” to double your post-battle loot!
    • The thrill of unpredictable rewards turns every fight into a gamble.
    • That addicting, can’t-stop feeling will pull you deep into the hack-and-slash world.
  • Stunning Illustrations Bring Your Adventure to Life
    • Character designs by the renowned Yuji Himukai.
    • Meet charming characters and beautifully illustrated allies who join your journey.
    • Their presence adds color and excitement to your quest, making every moment more memorable.
